{
    "number": 72266,
    "data": "1,1,3,10,35,126,462,1717,6451,24463,93518,360031,1394582,5430530,21242341,83411715,328589491,1297937234,5138431851,20380608990,80960325670,322016144629,1282138331587,5109310929719,20374764059254",
    "name": "Number of words of length 2n generated by the two letters s and t that reduce to the identity 1 using the relations sssssss=1, tt=1 and stst=1. The generators s and t along with the three relations generate the 14-element dihedral group D7.",
    "reference": [
        "H.S.M. Coxeter and W.O.J. Moser, Generators and Relations for Discrete Groups, Fourth Edition, (p.134)."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "G.f.: (1-8*x+20*x^2-16*x^3+2*x^4)/(1-9*x+26*x^2-25*x^3+4*x^4). - _Michael Somos_, Jul 21, 2002"
    ],
    "example": [
        "The words tttt=tsts=stst=1 so a(2)=3."
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) a(n)=if(n<1,n==0,sum(k=-(n-1)\\7,(n-1)\\7,C(2*n-1,n+7*k)))"
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,3",
    "author": "Jamaine Paddyfoot (jay_paddyfoot(AT)hotmail.com) and _John W. Layman_, Jul 08 2002",
    "references": 1,
    "revision": 4,
    "time": "2013-10-04T16:01:15-04:00",
    "created": "2003-05-16T03:00:00-04:00"
}
